data.name: Ghost on the Shore Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack of 'Ghost on the Shore'
featuring music by Shtevil, Ward Snauwaert, Dries Vienne and Simon Alexander.

song 1 "Flesh and Blood" by Shtevil & Ward Snauwaert
song 19 "Archie's Attic" by Dries Vienne
song 27 "Remembering" by Simon Alexander
song 24 "Awakening" by Ward Snauwaert
song 25 "The Heart of Little Rogue" by Ward Snauwaert
All others by Ward Snauwaert & Dries Vienne

Approximate running time: 100 minutes
